name: Contract Demon
description:
CONTRACT DEMON is a visual novel created for NaNoRenO 2019. an angel summons a demon, and they end up... in love?! it takes 20-30 minutes to read through the story. there are no choices or alternate endings.

content advisory: recommended ages 16+ (contains discussion of sexual topics, and strong language)

~ CREDITS ~

story+art+music - NomnomNami

translations coming sooooon

the soundtrack is also available on bandcamp!

FIRST CONTRACT (prologue comic) is the story of eleni's first time summoning kamilla! full color, 10 pages. if you enjoy this game, i hope you check out the comic, too!

if you want to support more cute stories like this one getting made (and see some cool behind-the-scenes updates while you're at it), consider giving a small donation on my ko-fi!

UPDATES:

  • 3/30/2019 - release day! had to reupload 2 hours after launch since the build somehow had my saves/clear data x_x sorry about that...
